ai-patthana21.4:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.4:0.3_0: Not for the sake of their (permission) or with only nature,
ai-patthana21.4:1.1_0: Not cause or reasoning, you don’t give rise to a cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.4:2.1_0: or cause or reasons not give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.4:3.1_0: Not cause or reasoning or reason,
ai-patthana21.4:3.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
